level.text: Sound-level meters and microphones shall meet Type II specifications per ANSI S1.4-1971.
Each sound-level meter shall be qualified annually.
Each sound-level meter and microphone device shall meet the following specifications:
External calibration devices with a known sound pressure level output at a single known frequency between two hundred (200) Hz and one thousand (1,000) Hz, as specified by the manufacturer;
Windscreen with insertion loss less than five tenths (0.5) dB(A) below eight (8) kHz;
Stopwatch, capable of cumulative operation and accurate to two percent (2%) or better;
Wind speed indicator with at least twenty percent (20%) accuracy at twelve miles per hour (12 mph); and
Earphones with impedance meeting the sound level meter manufacturer’s specifications.
